synopsis.text: Set in the seaside village of Narasakicho, the story follows Haruhiko Amami, a high school student whose life is intertwined with the town's magical gifts. When two hearts are connected, the gift manifests itself in a miraculous way. Haruhiko's ordinary life is disrupted by the return of his cute adoptive sister Riko Fukumine, who left town years ago but has now come back. Her return sets off a chain of events involving a tangle of crushes, romantic hopes, and rivalries. There is also a mischievous witch who keeps causing trouble by distributing fake magical gifts. In addition, Haruhiko feels compelled to use his own gift responsibly and to stop others from misusing theirs. With magical gifts, mysterious witches, and romantic entanglements, Haruhiko faces an emotionally complicated time as his peaceful life in Narasakicho becomes infused with drama, relationships, and a bit of magic.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
